battleship

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JButton
              • battleship.Ship
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class Ship
extends javax.swing.JButton
    Ship class that extends JButton. To be displayed at the bottom of the panel and used when placing ships.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Parker
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
